entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
